text: Mason A. Diaz (born May 16, 2000) is an American professional stock car racing driver. He currently competes full-time in the ARCA Menards Series East, driving the No. 25 Toyota Camry for Venturini Motorsports. ==Racing career== Starting at age four in go-karts, Diaz ran at Dominion Speedway in both Champ Car and Bandolero entries until age twelve. He later moved up to Legends car racing and late model racing, eventually running in the Pro All-Stars Series (PASS) during his late model days. He later started racing frequently at Southern National Motorsports Park. He was racing at the 2019 Snowflake 100 at Five Flags Speedway when a representative from Venturini Motorsports approached Diaz, and the two initially agreed to a deal that would have Diaz driving the team's No. 20 ARCA Menards Series entry whenever Chandler Smith was not driving. However, the deal was later changed to a full schedule in the ARCA Menards Series East. ===NASCAR Camping World Truck Series=== Diaz made his first and only Camping World Truck Series start at Martinsville, driving the No. 86 Chevrolet Silverado for Brandonbilt Motorsports. He started 9th and finished 23rd. ===NASCAR Xfinity Series=== Diaz made his Xfinity Series debut at Richmond fall race in 2018, driving for Brandonbilt Motorsports. ==Personal life== Diaz attends Old Dominion University. ==Motorsports career results== ===NASCAR=== (key) (Bold – Pole position awarded by qualifying time.
